flawed_nl_solution:
He knows 800*0.2=<<800*0.2=160>>160 words
So he needs to learn 800-160=<<800-160=640>>640 words
That means he needs to learn 640/40=<<640/40=61>>61 words per day
#### 61

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 61. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
